Key Match Events: The Mavericks outscored the Magic 46-20 over the final 15 minutes of the half.
Luka Doncic finished the game with 32 points
Dereck Lively II, Kyrie Irving and Daniel Gafford all notched double-figures in support
Pre-Game Insights: The Magic are without star forward Paolo Banchero due to a torn oblique and will be sidelined indefinitely.
Magic coach Jamahl Mosley said, 'It sucks. There’s no other way to put it,' referring to the impact of Banchero’s absence.
Post-Match Reflections: Franz Wagner paced the Magic offense with 13 points
The Magic finished 8-for-41 (19.5%) on three-pointers, their worst rate in the young season.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Magic only spent a few minutes in the American Airlines Center before they started loading the buses for Oklahoma City.
